title: [Self-Directed] Elementary Science Teaching Method Design Utilizing Learning Strategy Feedback Effects

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of Basic Science Curriculum Content and Instructional Methods
context.additional_context: Aims for pre-service teachers to acquire and apply effective learning strategies in elementary science lesson design. Requires differentiated feedback based on learners' expertise level (beginner)

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze learning strategies applied during their science lesson design process.
Learners can suggest learning strategy revisions according to feedback types with at least 85% accuracy.
Learners can improve learning efficiency by at least 20% by selecting feedback types appropriate to their proficiency level.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
